description:
Did you know that cardiorespiratory events occur in 16% of premature infants within 48 hours following vaccination? 

â€œAbnormal elevation of CRP (C-reactive protein) level occurred in 85% of infants administered multiple vaccines and up to 70% of those given a single vaccine. Overall, 16% of infants had vaccine-associated cardiorespiratory events within 48 hours postimmunization.

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17643770
